newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-NAB stake in St George falls.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-NAB stake in St George falls.

text.p: National Australia Bank Ltd (NAB) said its stake in St George Bank Ltd had fallen to 5.54 percent from 7.79 percent.
The fall follows the issue of new shares by St George following its scrip and cash takeover of fellow regional bank Advance Bank Australia Ltd.

NAB remains the largest shareholder in St George, with analysts still predicting that Australia's largest and most profitable bank could bid for the Sydney-based regional once the Wallis inquiry hands down its report into the financial system at the end of March. -- Sydney newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
